name: Marble Race 3D
description:
Racers, pick your marble!

Can you resist a good challenging race? What about a marble race with simple and easy to learn mechanics where the last marble gets knocked out of the competition?   Marble Race - 3D it’s all that and much more!

Race against time and opponents on beautifully diverse 3D tracks.
Choose your favorite powers combination, a marble that better represents your style and compete against your opponents

Remember, whatever are your tactics and strategies, always be the last marble standing!

Key features:

• Boost, Jump, Break and Shrink are some of the powers available so you can draw your best strategy to get to the finish line first.

• Explore different episodes with challenging levels and a great variety of exciting tracks to race. Can you master all the tracks and obtain all the achievements?

• The more you play, the more you unlock! There are dozens of marbles available for you to collect & race with!

It’s total marble madness!

DOWNLOAD NOW
